title: Why Mosquitoes Buzz in People's Ears
description: "In this Caldecott Medal winner, Mosquito tells a story that causes a jungle disaster. "Elegance has become the Dillons' hallmark. . . . Matching the art is Aardema's uniquely onomatopoeic text . . . An impressive showpiece."-Booklist , starred review.Winner of Caldecott MedalÂ in 1976 and the Brooklyn Art Books for Children Award in 1977.
author: Verna Aardema
